metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3104 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6.lkdtm_ARRAY_BOUNDS in drivers/misc/lkdtm/bugs.c lacks check of the returnvalue of kmalloc() and will cause the null pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-48-generic - 5.15.0-48.54
linux-image-5.15.0-48-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-48.54
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-48-generic - 5.15.0-48.54
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-48-generic-64k - 5.15.0-48.54
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1018-kvm - 5.15.0-1018.22
No subscription required
